sentences.en: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.cn: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.en: Carol managed a few proper snivels for the sake of appearance.
sentences.cn: 为了做做样子，卡萝尔适时地抽了几下鼻子。

sentences.en: Eileen was deep in concentration, and the sudden appearance of her daughter startled her.
sentences.cn: 艾琳正全神贯注，女儿突然出现吓了她一跳。

sentences.en: Flowering plants were making their first appearance, but were still a rarity.
sentences.cn: 显花植物开始出现了，但仍然很少。

sentences.en: He made a brief, unexpected appearance at the office.
sentences.cn: 他出乎意料地在办公室露了一下脸。

sentences.en: He made his last appearance for the club in the Cup Final.
sentences.cn: 他在足总杯决赛中最后一次为这个俱乐部出战。

sentences.en: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.cn: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.en: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.cn: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.en: Her appearance at this moment is an omen of disaster.
sentences.cn: 她在此刻出现预示着一场灾难。

sentences.en: I had taken great pains with my appearance.
sentences.cn: 我在自己的容貌上下了很多工夫。

sentences.en: It had the appearance of an 18 th century church.
sentences.cn: 它的外观像一座十八世纪的教堂.

sentences.en: It was his first public appearance since the election.
sentences.cn: 这是选举后他首次公开露面。

sentences.en: Marilyn made her last public appearance at Madison Square Garden.
sentences.cn: 玛丽莲最后一次公开亮相是在麦迪逊广场花园。

sentences.en: Ronnie put a high value on his appearance.
sentences.cn: 龙尼非常注重自己的外表。

sentences.en: She became neglectful of her appearance.
sentences.cn: 她变得不修边幅起来。

sentences.en: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.cn: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.en: She used to be so fussy about her appearance.
sentences.cn: 她过去非常在意自己的容貌。

sentences.en: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.cn: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.en: Sikhs were expected to adhere strictly to the religious rules concerning appearance.
sentences.cn: 锡克教徒应当严格遵守该教对外表的规定。

sentences.en: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.cn: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.en: The industry has changed greatly with the appearance of new technologies.
sentences.cn: 新技术问世后，这一行业出现了天翻地覆的变化。

sentences.en: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.cn: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.en: The president is a man with a commanding appearance.
sentences.cn: 总统是位威严的人.

sentences.en: The privations of monastery life were evident in his appearance.
sentences.cn: 从他的外表来看可以明显看出修道院生活的清贫。

sentences.en: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.cn: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.en: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.cn: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.en: to all appearances, it had been a normal day.
sentences.cn: 表面上看，那是平常的一天。

sentences.en: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.cn: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.en: What amazed him even more than her appearance was her poise.
sentences.cn: 她的容貌让他惊叹，而更让他惊讶的是她的沉着。

sentences.en: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.cn: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.en: You shouldn’t judge by appearances .
sentences.cn: 你不该以貌取人。

sentences.en: Young people are very sensitive about their appearance.
sentences.cn: 年轻人对外表很在意。

phrases.tran_cn: [俚]友情客串（名演员饰演小角色）
（尤指为了掩饰真实情况而）维持门面，装门面，装体面
（尤指出于礼节而）短时间到场，露面，亮相
外貌，外表；物理性质；体态
就表面看来，就所能看到的情况而言

trans.tran_cn: 外表，（突然）到来，出现，问世，露面，演出，出庭，表现
trans.tran_en: the way someone or something looks to other people
